messages.message: Hey all, I want to use form-recognizer in one of my flows -- what is the best way to do it? I need the latest version: `!pip3 install azure-ai-formrecognizer==3.1.0b3` basically the UDF would use code similar to this notebook: https://instabase.com/anantb/workspace/fs/Instabase%20Drive/depot/metlife/LTC-Invoices/notebooks/ltc_invoices.ipynb
You would need to install that in app-tasks, inside the `requirements.in (http://requirements.in)` file in app-tasks., and then run `pip-compile`
